articles.title: FM Hosts Friendship Meeting
articles.content:
FM Hosts Friendship Meeting
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A friendship meeting with members of the missions of international organizations here was held on Thursday under the sponsorship of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					 Present there on invitation were members of the missions including Jerome Sauvage, U.N. resident coordinator and resident representative of the UNDP to the DPRK. 
					
					 On hand were Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials of the ministry. 
					
					 Speeches were made there. 
					
					 The participants wished Kim Jong Il good health and deepened the friendly feelings while talking about the need to develop the cooperative relations between the DPRK and international organizations.

articles.title: Kim Chaek University Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
Kim Chaek University Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Kim Chaek University of Technology headed by President Hong So Hon returned home by air Thursday after visiting the U.S. at the invitation of Syracuse University of the U.S.
					 During its stay the delegation discussed matters on boosting exchange and cooperation between the two universities in the IT field and reached a series of agreements.

articles.title: DPRK-Russia Friendship Film Week Opens
articles.content:
DPRK-Russia Friendship Film Week Opens
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A film week was opened with due ceremony at Taedongmun Cinema Thursday on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the conclusion of the treaty of friendship, good neighborliness and cooperation between the DPRK and Russia.
					 Present there were Hong Son Ok, vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairwoman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, officials concerned and working people in the city.
					
					 On hand were Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The speakers referred to the fact that the two countries have developed the bilateral relations of cooperation in various fields in line with the desire and the interests of their peoples after the conclusion of the treaty.
					
					 Saying that meetings of the leaders of the two countries and adoption of historic joint declarations have given further momentum to the DPRK-Russia relations of friendship and cooperation in the past decade, they added that they would make efforts to boost these relations.
					
					 And the participants watched a Russian feature film

articles.title: Lecture Marks Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence
articles.content:
Lecture Marks Anniversary of Sri Lanka's Independence
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A lecture was given at the Chollima Hall of Culture on Thursday on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of Sri Lanka's independence.
					 Present there were the chairman of the DPRK-Sri Lanka Friendship Association and other members of the association and working people in the city.
					
					 The chairman of the association in the lecture referred to the achievements made by the government and the people of Sri Lanka in their efforts to achieve national reconciliation and unity and build a new society.
					
					 A message of greetings addressed to the Sri Lanka-People's Korea Friendship Association by the DPRK-Sri Lanka Friendship Association was adopted at the lecture.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit Museum and Film Studio
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit Museum and Film Studio
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of different embassies here on Thursday visited the Revolutionary Museum of the Ministry of Culture and the Korean Film Studio on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Being briefed on the fact that Kim Jong Il put forward the idea on the literature and the arts of Juche and wisely led the work to put it into practice, they looked round historic relics and materials.
					
					 Then, they watched mock-up location streets and scenes of cutting films.

articles.title: Study Tour for 1,000-ri Journey Comes to End
articles.content:
Study Tour for 1,000-ri Journey Comes to End
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The study tour for tracing the course of the 1,000-ri journey for national liberation made up of school youth and children from across the country came to a successful end. It was sponsored to commemorate the 85th anniversary of the 1,000-ri journey for national liberation made by President Kim Il Sung and the 35th anniversary of the study tour to trace its course initiated by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The members of the study tour group for tracing the course left Mangyongdae on January 22 and arrived in Phophyong on February 3. 
					
					 Phophyong is the historic place where the President made his firm pledge not to return home unless Korea became independent in his teens before crossing the River Amnok. 
					
					 Upon its arrival a meeting took place in front of the statue of the President standing there.
					
					 A report was made by Ham Kwang Chol, secretary of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, to be followed by speeches.
					
					 They referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il paid deep attention to the study tour and showed such deep trust and loving care as letting even a plane fly to bring the gifts associated with his benevolence to the members of the study tour group, though he was busy making endless forced march despite blizzards from the outset of the year.
					
					 The school youth and children are faced with an honorable task to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche generation after generation under his revolutionary Songun leadership, they noted. 
					
					 They called upon them to prepare themselves as patriots in the Songun era who reliably defend and glorify the socialist country, firmly trusting and following Kim Jong Il only.
					
					 They underscored the need for them to study harder and take more active part in their organizational life just as they had vowed through the study tour in order to stoutly grow up to be pillars who will shoulder upon themselves the future of the Songun country.

articles.title: New Electromagnetic Striker Developed
articles.content:
New Electromagnetic Striker Developed
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A new model of electromagnetic striker has been developed in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					It has a noise level 1/5 lower and electricity consumption 1/8 - 1/5 less than those of a pneumatic rock-drill.
					
					It, the striking energy of which is 10-15J, is 10 kilograms heavy and ensures 1,200 strokes per minute.
					
					It is effectively used for the purpose of building stone processing, drilling, earth and concrete mixture tamping and incrustation removal from vessel hulls.
					
					Its products are well received among users for their delicate and fine processing.

articles.title: Kaesong Folk Hotel
articles.content:
Kaesong Folk Hotel
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Kaesong Folk Hotel, built in Korean style, is located at the foot of Mt. Janam in Kaesong City, Korea.  
					 It, covering 12,000 square meters, has a total floor space of over 5,000 square meters. It, with a sleeping accommodation for more than 120 persons, consists of a main building and auxiliary buildings. 
					
					 Some of the gable-roofed buildings have two or three floor-heated rooms and a floor of Korean verandah.
					
					 Those in the east have bedrooms and those in the west are equipped with restaurants, shops and other service facilities. 
					
					 The hotel serves bouilli of chicken with insam inside, cake made from wheat-flour, oil and honey, rice cake dumpling covered with bean paste and other dishes peculiar to Kaesong.

articles.title: Pyongyangites Go to Work with Full Confidence
articles.content:
Pyongyangites Go to Work with Full Confidence
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A day of Pyongyang begins with citizens going to work, full of hope.
					Among them are people going to the construction sites of dwellings for 100,000 families, girls to the Pyongyang Textile Mill and young women to the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory.
					
					 Mirrored in their faces are joy of labor and life as well as a high degree of zeal for making a good job in the day's work for the development of the country.
					
					 The Korean socialist system gives equal rights of labor to all the people, legally ensures all conditions needed for their labor and enforces such people-oriented policies as free medical care and education.
					
					 There has been no change in their application, even in the period of the "Arduous March", forced march.
					
					 The citizens actually experience the benefits of socialism through many things like the everyday supply of bean-flour drink to their schoolchildren, vaccinations given to all the people and recreation system for the working people.
					
					 Feeling grateful for the advantageous socialist system, Pyongyangites have renewed their enthusiasm on the way to work to make greater achievements in their work, inspired by the joint New Year editorial calling for radically improving the people's living by accelerating the development of light industry and agriculture once again.

articles.title: All People Called upon to Advance at "Huichon Speed"
articles.content:
All People Called upon to Advance at "Huichon Speed"
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The service personnel and people of the DPRK are now dashing ahead at the "Huichon speed", the speed of the great advance, bringing about unprecedented great leap forward, to open the gate to a thriving nation. The "Huichon speed" is the Songun Chollima speed, a product of the ever-victorious offensive spirit of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a signed article.
					 It continues:
					
					 The soldier-builders in the construction sites of the Huichon Power Station have given free rein to the revolutionary soldier spirit and the revolutionary spirit of fortitude, opening a bright prospect for completing in a matter of two or three years the large-scale project which would take more than a decade at an ordinary pace. 
					
					 The "Huichon speed" represents a new Chollima speed in the Songun era as it is based on the revolutionary soldier spirit the keynote of which is the spirit of devotedly defending the leader, the work style of carrying through his instructions in a do-or-die spirit and the heroic self-sacrificing spirit. Herein lie the essence and the inexhaustible might of the new Chollima speed in the era of Songun.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK have adorned their drives with a heroic epic of creation and construction in the offensive spirit of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They built a socialist power on the war debris and brought a great heyday to the era of the Workers' Party by advancing in the spirit of Chollima plus the tempo of the speed campaign. This was a miracle which could be wrought only by the army and the people armed with the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 The offensive spirit of heroic Korea has reached an extraordinary level thanks to the Songun policy of the WPK.
					
					 It aroused all the people to create a new speed of advance of Songun Korea in the revolutionary soldier spirit and the Kanggye spirit in the most difficult period of the "Arduous March," the forced march, and made the waves of the movement for leap forward and innovation sweep the whole country through a high-pitched drive for a great surge. The new Chollima speed reported from the construction sites of the power station is the noble fruition of the Songun policy and Songun revolutionary leadership of the WPK.
					
					 The "Huichon speed" represents the revolutionary mettle of the country advancing at the maximum speed towards a thriving nation with inexhaustible dynamism and indomitable will and the heroic spirit of all the servicepersons and people bringing about dramatic changes in all sectors effecting a great surge.

articles.title: Unity of Progressive Forces Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Unity of Progressive Forces Called for in S. Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Democratic Labor Party of south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on Jan. 30 to mark the anniversary of its founding at which it called for the unity of the progressive forces.
					 The speakers at the meeting referred to the strenuous struggle the party has waged to achieve peace on the Korean Peninsula and bring down the outdated politics. 
					
					 It is the foremost task to achieve the unity of the progressive forces as its fulfillment brooks no delay and is unavoidable now that the suppression of the party under the pretext of security and the conservative media's false report about it are going on, they held. 
					
					 They called for achieving the unity of the progressive forces to sternly judge the present regime and the "Grand National Party" through the forthcoming "election to the local self-governing bodies" and put an end to the repressive rule.

articles.title: NIS's Suppression of Democracy Censured in S. Korea
articles.content:
NIS's Suppression of Democracy Censured in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Media and civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Media Action, the Confederation of Trade Unions, the Bar Association for Democratic Society and the Solidarity for Progress held a press conference in Youido, Seoul on Monday to lash out at the puppet National Intelligence Service's suppression of democracy.
					 The organizations at the conference accused the NIS of pressurizing a civic organization to cancel its projected event on the charge of its refusal to pay the license fee for the KBS which has been reduced to a trumpeter of the regime.
					
					 The organizations charged that the NIS has persisted in illegal investigation into civilians and human rights abuses as it is seized by the arrogant and self-righteous view that "those in power are allowed to behave as they please."
					
					 The Citizen's Solidarity for Democratic Society in its statement on the same day deplored that the illegal acts of the NIS are going beyond the tolerance limit under the present regime and demanded its Director Won Se Hun step down at once.

articles.title: Adherence to Idea of "By Our Nation Itself" Called for
articles.content:
Adherence to Idea of "By Our Nation Itself" Called for
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held its 6th general meeting in Germany on Jan. 30 at which it called for significantly commemorating the 10th anniversary of the joint declaration.
					 A resolution was adopted at the meeting. It recalled that after the publication of the joint declaration such happy events had taken place one after another as the thawing of ice--the division and confrontation which lasted more than half a century--by the hot wind of reunification and the reconnection of severed vein of nation.
					
					 But, today the touch-and-go situation, in which a war may break out any moment, is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the south Korean authorities' policy of confrontation with the DPRK, it pointed out, stressing that the present critical situation should never be overlooked nor ignored.
					
					 The resolution called upon all Koreans to remain more faithful to the idea of "By our nation itself", decisively reject the south Korean authorities' treacherous doctrine of attaching priority to foreign forces and resolutely protect the dignity and interests of the nation.
					
					 It underscored the need for the fellow countrymen of different strata at home and abroad to positively achieve national reconciliation irrespective of ideology, ism, political view and religious belief and activate visits and contacts and multifarious cooperation.
					
					 It stressed that they would glorify the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration as a nationwide reunification festival for bringing about a new turning point in the national reunification movement and thus make contributions to demonstrating the significance of the joint declaration in the nation's history and its vitality.

articles.title: Joint New Year Editorial Supported by Russian Party
articles.content:
Joint New Year Editorial Supported by Russian Party
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Sazhi Umalatova, chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, released a statement on Jan. 29 in support of the DPRK's joint New Year editorial.
					 The joint editorial serves as important guidelines calling upon all the Korean people to work creation and feats, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 2010 is a significant year for all the Korean people as it marks the 65th anniversaries of the Workers' Party of Korea and the liberation of the country.
					
					 The joint editorial calls for launching a high-pitched campaign to push back the frontiers of science and technology in all sectors.
					
					In the statement the chairwoman wished the Korean people bigger success in building a great prosperous and powerful nation under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Guinea and Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Guinea and Myanmar
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar on General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science" was held in Guinea and a meeting and a film show in Myanmar on Jan. 27 and 28 to celebrate his birthday.
					 Speeches were made there. 
					
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said it was clearly proved through the publication of the work "Socialism Is a Science" that the socialist cause is the just cause of the popular masses' independence and humankind's advance toward socialism is the irresistible law governing the development of history. 
					
					 Abdoulaye Conte, chief of the Guinean Group for the Study of Kimjongilism, said that the DPRK's is a most advantageous and powerful socialism enjoying unquestionable support and confidence from the people as it is based on the Juche-oriented standpoint and attitude toward the popular masses.
					
					 Abdoulaye Diallo, chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea, stressed that the feats of Kim Jong Il who has defended the socialist cause will shine forever in history.
					
					 The secretary general of the Union Solidarity and Development Association of Myanmar lauded the leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il, saying that he glorified 2009 as a year of great changes to be specially recorded in the history of Korea and is making ceaseless journey of field guidance to various fields of the national economy from the very start of 2010.
					
					 Appreciated at the film show was Korean film "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Panamaa
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Panama
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was brought out in booklet by the Circle of Studies for the Juche Idea in Panama on January 28.
					 The work, published on Sept. 5, Juche 97 (2008), describes the six decade-long history of the DPRK as a great history of struggle and victory, creation and change in which the Korean people have defended the independence and honor of the country and built a rich and prosperous socialist power, weathering out the tempest of the revolution under the guidance of the great leader and party. And it clarifies the idea that even a small and backward country can turn into a developed and dignified power when it is guided by a great leader and party.
					
					 Also expounded in it are the tasks and ways for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche under the banner of the Juche idea, the banner of Songun.

articles.title: DPRK Holidays to Be Commemorated in Austria and France
articles.content:
DPRK Holidays to Be Commemorated in Austria and France
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 was formed in Colombia on Jan. 27 and preparatory committees for celebrating February 16 in Austria and France on Jan. 29.
					 Fernando Sanchez, chairman of the Colombia-Korea Association of Friendship and Culture, and Jairo Gonzalez Trujillo, president of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia, were elected co-chairmen of the Colombian preparatory committee and Adolf Wurzer, general secretary of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK, and Andre Aubry, delegate president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, chairmen of the Austrian and French preparatory committees.
					
					 The preparatory committees set a period of celebrations and decided to hold various political and cultural events in the period.

articles.title: ATCC apoya iniciativa de firma de convenio de paz
articles.content:
ATCC apoya iniciativa de firma de convenio de paz
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ATCC) -- La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea expuso la disposicion de concertar el convenio de paz a los paises responsables del Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea, lo cual disfruta de activo apoyo y aprobacion de la sociedad internacional.
					  La paz es muy importante para el pueblo coreano que durante mas de medio siglo vive en medio del peligro permanente de guerra.
					
					  Nuestra propuesta deviene el proyecto mas adecuado y realista, capaz de abrir la nueva coyuntura tanto para preparar la garantia real del alivio de tension en la Peninsula Coreana como para poner fin a la intervencion extranjera y solucionar el problema de la reunificacion en el principio de la autodeterminacion nacional y es el remedio mas racional que conviene a la observacion de la paz de Asia y el resto del mundo.
					
					  Pero, algunas fuerzas ponen obstaculos en la realizacion de esta propuesta calificandola de la "prematura" e insistiendo en que "la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea debe retornar primero a las conversaciones a 6 bandas". En una palabra, demandan tratar primero el problema nuclear.
					
					  Esta absurda teoria no pasa de ser un intento de quienes quieren debilitar la realidad y la racionalidad de la propuesta de la firma del convenio de paz y obstaculizar la realizacion de la paz, la estabilidad y la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  La discusion del problema del establecimiento del sistema de paz es muy urgente para realizar "armoniosamente" los articulos de la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre, entre otros, la desnuclearizacion, la normalizacion de las relaciones, la remuneracion de energia y el establecimiento del sistema de paz.
					
					  La insistencia en que el establecimiento del sistema de paz es el problema a ser discutido despues de ser resuelto el problema nuclear es la teoria invertida y significa el intento de evitar la solucion del problema.
					
					  Terminaron infructiferas las conversaciones destinadas a promover la desnuclearizacion antes de discutir el sistema de paz, aunque fueron efectuadas durante varios anos pasados.
					
					  Esto demuestra fehacientemente que la labor iniciada sin confianza no puede esperar un buen resultado.
					
					  Nunca podra ser solucionado tal problema sin la confianza entre las partes interesadas.
					
					  Romper el circulo vicioso de desconfianza e impulsar la desnuclearizacion mediante la creacion de la confianza, he aqui el proposito de nuestra propuesta sobre la firma del convenio de paz.
					
					  Ahora, es precisamente el tiempo que sustituir el Acuerdo de Armisticio por el convenio de paz.
					
					  Solo cuando sea concertada cuanto antes el segundo que haga las veces del primero, es posible  convertir las agudas relaciones de beligerancia entre la RPDC y EE.UU. en las de paz y de confianza y lograr la duradera paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  El inicio pronto de las negociaciones por la concertacion del convenio de paz es muy adecuado y apropiado tanto a la luz de la demanda de la situacion tensa dada en la Peninsula Coreana como en vista de la oportunidad de este ano del 60o aniversario del estallido de la guerra coreana y la corriente de la actual situacion internacional en desarrollo.
					
					  Si se firma el convenio de paz, se creara la confianza entre la RPDC y EE.UU., se eliminaran las relaciones hostiles, con lo cual la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana se impulsara con mas vigor.

articles.title: Semana de proyeccion filmica por firma del tratado Corea-Rusia
articles.content:
Semana de proyeccion filmica por firma del tratado Corea-Rusia
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 4 en el Cine Taedongmun la semana de proyeccion filmica por el aniversario 10 de la firma del tratado de amistad, buena vecindad y cooperacion entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Federacion Rusa.
					En la ocasion, estuvieron presentes la vicepresidenta del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y presidenta de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Rusia Hong Son Ok y otros funcionarios, trabajadores capitalinos, el embajador Valery Sukhinin y otros miembros de la embajada rusa acreditada en Corea.
					
					En el acto hubo discursos.
					
					Los oradores se refirieron a que despues de la firma del tratado, los dos paises han desarrollado en diversas ramas las relaciones bilaterales de cooperacion conforme a la aspiracion e interes de sus pueblos.
					
					Recordaron que se realizo el encuentro de los maximos Dirigentes de ambos paises y fueron aprobadas las historicas declaraciones conjuntas, gracias a lo cual se fortalecieron aun mas durante estos 10 anos pasados las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Rusia y destacaron que se esforzaran por ampliarlas y desarrollarlas.
					
					Seguidamente, los participantes vieron una pelicula de la FR.

articles.title: Conferencia por 62o aniversario de independencia de Sri Lanka
articles.content:
Conferencia por 62o aniversario de independencia de Sri Lanka
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 4 en la Casa Cultural Chollima la conferencia por el 62o aniversario de la independencia de Sri Lanka.
					En la ocasion participaron el presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Sri Lanka, los miembros de esta entidad y trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					El presidente de la Asociacion en la conferencia senalo que el gobierno y el pueblo de la Republica Democratica Socialista de Sri Lanka obtienen exitos en la lucha por lograr la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales y construir una nueva sociedad.
					
					En la ocasion fue aprobado un mensaje de felicitacion de dicha entidad coreana a la Asociacion de Amistad Sri Lanka-Corea Popular.

articles.title: Jovenes y ninos escolares de Corea terminan el recorrido de mil ries
articles.content:
Jovenes y ninos escolares de Corea terminan el recorrido de mil ries
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ATCC) -- Termino con exito la marcha de los jovenes y ninos escolares de Corea a lo largo del "Camino de mil ries (400 kilometros) para la restauracion", organizada con motivo de cumplirse los 85 anos desde que lo emprendiera el Presidente Kim Il Sung y 35 anos desde que organizara el Dirigente Kim Jong Il la primera peregrinacion por el mismo itinerario.
					  Los miembros de la caravana de recorrido partieron el 22 de enero de Mangyongdae y llegaron el dia 3  de este mes a Phophyong a pasos apresurados siguiendo la ruta tomada por el Presidente.
					
					  Phophyong es el terreno historico donde el Presidente cruzo a su tierna edad de 10 anos y pico el rio Amnok jurando que no volveria a Corea antes de lograr su independencia.
					
					  Tuvo lugar el dia 3 el acto de llegada ante la estatua de bronce del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung erguida en Phophyong.
					
					  En la ocasion escucharon el informe de Ham Kwang Chol, secretario del CC de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, y las intervenciones.
					
					  Desde los primeros dias de este ano, el Dirigente emprende sin treguas la marcha forzada de orientacion pese al intenso frio, dijeron los oradores y continuaron que en ese curso tan atareado, el presto profunda atencion a esta marcha de recorrido de los jovenes y ninos escolares de todo el pais y dispenso gran confianza y amor de enviarles regalos por avion.
					
					  Hoy dia, nosotros, los jovenes y ninos escolares, tenemos la honrosa tarea de llevar a cabo de generacion en generacion la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la guia del Dirigente sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, apuntaron.
					
					  Agregaron que todos ellos deben confiar firmemente y seguir unicamente al Dirigente y prepararse como patriotas de la epoca del Songun que sepan defender con firmeza y glorificar la patria socialista.
					
					  Enfatizaron que todos los jovenes y ninos escolares han de estudiar mas y mejorar su vida organizativa de acuerdo con el juramento tomado en la marcha, de modo que se formaran como reservas encargados del futuro de la patria del Songun.
